title: Graduating from Google: Leadership Lessons
description: Linda El Awar thinks she has gone through a transformational experience at the Harvard Business School until she joins Google, Inc., where she discovers what it really means to be a leader. She navigates a challenging journey filled with unexpected twists, triumphs, and even heartbreak as she creates her own path at one of the worldâ€™s most mysterious sales organizations. Despite her relentless dedication to Google and her determination to achieve her professional goals, Linda does not actually realize what makes the company so special until after she resigns. Only then does she comprehend what is a true leader.
author: Linda El Awar
